phrs.translation: 身无分文, 身份分文, 穷光蛋的, 出版者

sentences.sentence: The hugely popular blog the Skint Foodie chronicles how Tony balances his love of good food with living on benefits.
sentences.translation: 广受欢迎的博客《吝啬的美食家》记录了托尼是如何平衡他对美食的热爱和靠救济金生活的。

sentences.sentence: I am skint, can not afford famous brand shoe!
sentences.translation: 我是穷光蛋，买不起名牌鞋！

sentences.sentence: Would you like to join someone who skint his leg when he stole chickens.
sentences.translation: 你愿意照料一个偷鸡时把腿摔断了的人吗？
